text: musa atyantam keapitanum duhkhitanumayi tanre janatayilekk matanniccennu. addeham parannu: "enre janame, ninnalute nathan ninnalkk nalla vagdanam nalkiyirunnille? ennitt kalamere nintupeayea? atallenkil ninnalute nathanre keapam ninnalil vannupatikkanamenn ninnalagrahiccea? atukeantanea ninnalenneatulla vagdanam langhiccat?â€
